user.description: Im Moment gibt es nur Wetterstationen, aber es kommen weitere Typen. Es können beliebig viele Stationen hinzugefügt werden. Die einzige Einschränkung ist, dass jede Station nur einmal eingerichtet sein darf.
user.title: Deutscher Wetterdienst

station_select.description:
Some stations offer actual measured values (with a slight delay), which could provide more accurate data. However, the forecasts are still very accurate.

The station name is configured in the next step.
station_select.title: Station selection

station_configure_report.description:
You have selected a station where actual measurement data is available.
The measured values might provide values with higher accuracy, but they are available only with a slight time delay (under 1 hour).
station_configure_report.title: Data source configuration

station_configure.description: DWD provides an hourly data update, however, this will increase data usage significantly as the sensor values are bundled in the hourly update (~37MB vs. ~0.17MB per update).
station_configure.title: Station configuration

data.hourly_update: Force hourly data update (see warning above before enabling)

granularity.description: It is possible to average the forecast values for the weather entity over a given period of time. Please select the ones you want to use, the data is only fetched once.
granularity.title: Forecast granularity

error.invalid_station_id: Invalid Station! Please select one from the list below:
error.invalid_weather_interval: You have to select at least one weather interval

options.report_data: Use report data for current weather (slight delay in data possible)
options.forecast_data: Use forecast data for current weather
